blogPost.title: Investors may have to wait a while for Alibaba, a former market darling, to regain its glory https://t.co/M5R4bLcNcM
blogPost.author: The Wall Street Journal

localize.full_text: かつての市場の寵児であったアリババが栄光を取り戻すには、投資家はしばらく待たなければならないかもしれない https://t.co/M5R4bLcNcM
投资者可能需要等待一段时间，才能让曾经的市场宠儿阿里巴巴重新获得荣耀https://t.co/M5R4bLcNcM。
投資者可能需要等待一段時間，才能讓曾經的市場寵兒阿里巴巴重新獲得榮耀https://t.co/M5R4bLcNcM。

next.title: Covid-19 patients who were given the low-cost antidepressant fluvoxamine were significantly less likely to require hospitalization https://t.co/aeJwQjVmGV

给予低成本抗抑郁药氟伏沙明的Covid-19患者需要住院治疗的可能性明显降低 https://t.co/aeJwQjVmGV
